title: Provides for state reimbursement to all elementary and secondary schools, BOCES, and schools for the deaf and blind for the cost of metropolitan commuter transportation
summary: Provides for state reimbursement to all elementary and secondary schools, BOCES, and schools for the deaf and blind for the cost of metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax payments.
